application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (external finishes), 6 (sustainable drainage strategy), 7 (sustainability and energy conservation), 9 (waste and recycling facilities), 10 (secure cycle parking), 17 (Fire Safety Strategy) and 18 (vehicular crossover) of planning permission 22/02211/FUL (Erection of single storey rear extension, raising roof height and conversion of existing dwelling to create 2 nos dwellings.)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the Conditions 3 (external finishes) of planning permission 22/02211/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D4 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the 6 (sustainable drainage strategy) of planning permission 22/02211/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to demonstrate it would prevent the development from increasing the risk of flooding to the site itself or elsewhere, in accordance with policy SI.13 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the Condition 7 (sustainability and energy conservation) of planning permission 22/02211/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to ensure sustainability and energy conservation, in accordance with policy SI.2 and SI.5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1, DM3 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the Condition 18  (vehicular crossover) of planning permission 22/02211/FUL. Therefore, the proposal fails to safeguard highway safety in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
